title: Smart case & auto wake/sleep not working since Android 10 update. Pls help.
content: Hi All, I own Google pixel phone and smart case for the same that really worked smartly until Android 10 update came up. I really regret updating my phone. Since then my expensive smart case has stoped working although case magnet function is completely fine. Can anyone please help me understand how can I get back to same situation, once I close the flat it's locked and when I open it I need finger to unlock the same. Point is it's not locking while closing the case.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
